Perfect for my kiddo's "jersey day" during spirit week!

As a fan of the Eagles, this jersey was the perfect color for tailgating and game watching. I could not wait to wear this jersey and it did not disappoint. Light weight and breathable, it was more comfortable than I expected. The numbers do have some intentional fading, almost like water drips. I would have preferred if they were solid or shiny, but still a good buy.

I got this jersey for my teenage daughter and she really likes it a lot. The quality is OK. It’s not the best quality but for the price is very good. It’s great for wearing to school or lounging around the house good deal for the price very comfortable
Great tee to throw on with anything ! You can dress it up or down. Super comfy and soft

评论概述: Trendy and Comfortable Grunge Tee for Summer
评论详情: This oversized jersey top is a stylish pick for summer. The graphic design gives it a cool Y2K streetwear vibe, and the fabric is soft and breathable. Perfect for casual days out or layering with accessories!

评论概述: Great for walking around the house
评论详情: I’m obsessed with this oversized graphic tee! The design is super trendy and gives off a cool, Y2K streetwear vibe, which is exactly what I was looking for. The fabric is soft and comfortable, making it perfect for summer. It’s lightweight and breathable, but still thick enough to feel like good quality. I love how relaxed the fit is—it’s perfect for pairing with shorts or leggings for a laid-back, casual look. Whether I’m running errands or hanging out with friends, this shirt is my new go-to. Definitely a great buy for anyone into grunge or streetwear styles!
A tee shirt quality but I still like this it’s not that see through which is great!’

I was initially very excited about this order. I was intrigued by the classic vintage styling and design and was even more attracted by the price. Upon arrival, I was immediately disappointed with the overall quality. The jersey mesh is thin, the holes are small, and the material feels cheap. The numbers are printed on vinyl with simulated distress effects but poorly done. Although it was advertised as "oversized," it's not quite and would've preferred a larger size and fit. Given the price, I should've expected lackluster quality. In the end, it's best to spend a little bit more money and get something a bit better.

评论概述: Almost exactly what we were looking for and it fits as hoped
评论详情: This oversized should fits pretty much exactly as expected. The material is comfortable and easy wearing. The only concern was around the lettering as it was a bit stiffer than expected and doesn't allow the fabric to bend/flow really well. This is a great shirt for the price.
This is a pretty comfortable, basic cotton jersey. It’s oversized which I like. The sleeves are a longer T-length. The number graphic is printed on well. No complaints!
Exactly what we needed fit as expected
Exactly as expected. Cute oversized shirt, boxy fit.
Looks just like the photo I wear xl in most tops comfortably. The large fit good not snug I have room in the front and the sides
